channel.title: Specials
channel.description:
In my server, I have specs. But the only problem is, that it disconnects when you're not attacking npc. But it works, while IN combat.
I also can't attack players with specials.

item.title: Specials
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

In my server, I have specs. But the only problem is, that it disconnects when you’re not attacking npc.
But it works, while IN combat.

I also can’t attack players with specials.

Read full topic
